title: A total solar eclipse that occurred on July 16, 790 was recorded...
content:
A total solar eclipse that occurred on July 16, 790 was recorded in hieroglyphs on a Mayan monument (eclipse map). ‚ÄúThis find has frequently been proposed as a way to establish a correlation between the Maya Calendar and the Julian Calendar.‚Äù
